input_text:
Job Title: Digital Marketing Intern

Location: Salt Lake City, UT

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
At Extra Space Storage, what matters to you, matters to us! Join a company that cares about you.

It is an exciting time to be at Extra Space. We have been featured on multiple "Best Places to Work" awards, including Forbes and Glassdoor. We’re an S&P 500 company that hasn’t stopped growing since our founding in 1977. Today we are leading the self-storage industry in more ways than one, but in order to maintain this lead, we need exceptionally motivated, capable, and driven people like you. Self-storage is our product, helping people is our passion. Come grow with the largest self-storage company in the world and find out why so many of our employees recommend us as a great place to work.

Our Digital Marketing Intern aids in pulling reporting and completing management tasks in Google Ads and Microsoft Ads for the paid search team.

Primary Responsibilities

Add new paid search campaigns for new stores on a weekly basis Update paid media reports on a monthly basis Upload creatives for paid search and paid media campaigns Launch ad copy tests and monitor performance Pull routine and ad hoc reporting requests Update reporting to review store performance on a weekly basis Review reporting for individual stores and make recommendations for paid search budget changes Complete competitor analysis 

Job Specifications

Desire to learn paid search Software skills are required, as well as Internet research abilities, strong attention to detail, communication skills and organizational skills. 

Education And Experience

High School diploma or GED preferred 

If you are a current Extra Space employee, please apply through Jobs Hub in Workday.

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

Experience Level (if available): Internship

output_json.title: Digital Marketing Intern
output_json.summary: Join Extra Space Storage, a leading self-storage company, as a Digital Marketing Intern.
job_responsibilities: Add new paid search campaigns for new stores on a weekly basis
Update paid media reports on a monthly basis
Upload creatives for paid search and paid media campaigns
Launch ad copy tests and monitor performance
Pull routine and ad hoc reporting requests
Update reporting to review store performance on a weekly basis
Review reporting for individual stores and make recommendations for paid search budget changes
output_json.company_information: Extra Space Storage is an S&P 500 company that has been featured on multiple 'Best Places to Work' awards, including Forbes and Glassdoor.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.
